attributes.action: Acknowledge Brexit was not the voice of all people in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: The country has been grouped together under one result. There is unfair representation. Scotland has Nicola sturgeon. I wish we did. We have chaos, no plan and no leadership.
attributes.background: I didn't vote for Brexit. I wanted to remain. I Don't want to be grouped together with the leave voters and given responsibility for their vote.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
